name: MARPG
description:
Controls: WASD to move, Q to inspect, E to interact, Enter for basic attack, Space to dash, hold P for magic ball

A small demo for a 2D action-adventure game set in a low fantasy world. Main character is the sheriff of a small village in a region that is being influenced by a magical force. The player has a basic melee attack, which grants magic points when it hits enemies. These magic points can be used to conjure a magical sphere. This sphere explodes when it hits a wall or an emey. It damages and pushes things in its blast radius.
